gramGrp.pos:
ERG VB
with
‘into’
or
RECIP VB

sense.def:
Kadar ljudje
integrate into a social group
, se pomešajo med osebe v neki družbeni skupini.

seg.quote: ...helping the individual integrate quickly into the community.
...ways of integrating handicapped children into ordinary schools.
In theory, all schools should already be integrated.
...an integrated school for Protestants and Catholics.
He campaigned for the integration of immigrants into British society.

sense.def:
To integrate things
pomeni združiti stvari tako, da so tesno povezane ali oblikujejo eno stvar.

seg.quote: The two regional railway systems were integrated.
